statements: SELECT policy_holder_name, updated_on, amendment_reason FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE policy_id = 1
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE updated_on BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT policy_holder_name, term_changes FROM health_insurance_policy_updates ORDER BY updated_on DESC
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE amendment_reason LIKE '%claim%'
SELECT policy_holder_name FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE term_changes ->> 'coverage' = 'basic'
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, updated_on, amendment_reason, term_changes FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY updated_on DESC
SELECT policy_holder_name, amendment_reason FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE term_changes->>'deductible' > '1000'
SELECT * FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT policy_holder_name, updated_on, term_changes->>'coverage_type' FROM health_insurance_policy_updates
SELECT policy_id, amended_on, amendment_reason FROM health_insurance_policy_updates WHERE term_changes->'premium_increase' = true
SELECT * FROM policy_updates;
SELECT policy_id, update_date, update_description FROM policy_updates WHERE policy_update_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policy_amendments WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT amendment_date, amendment_details FROM policy_amendments ORDER BY amendment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, amendment_date, amendment_details FROM policy_amendments WHERE policy_id = 5 AND amendment_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM policy_updates WHERE policy_id = 100 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, update_description FROM policy_updates WHERE update_date <= '2022-10-01' AND policy_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY policy_id ASC;
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(policy_update_id) AS update_count FROM policy_updates GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(policy_update_id) > 5;
SELECT pu.policy_id, pu.update_date, pa.amendment_details FROM policy_updates pu JOIN policy_amendments pa ON pu.policy_id = pa.policy_id ORDER BY pu.update_date DESC, pa.amendment_date ASC;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(update_date) AS latest_update FROM policy_updates GROUP BY policy_id ORDER BY latest_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyUpdates WHERE update_type = 'Premium Change';
SELECT policy_number, update_date, update_type FROM PolicyUpdates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT amendment_number, amendment_date, amendment_details FROM Amendments WHERE amendment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, change_date FROM TermChanges WHERE change_number = '12345' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT policy_number, change_details FROM TermChanges WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PolicyUpdates WHERE policy_number='12345';
SELECT policy_number, update_date, update_type FROM PolicyUpdates WHERE update_type='Policy Change' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, COUNT(*) AS num_updates FROM PolicyUpdates GROUP BY policy_number HAVING num_updates > 1;
SELECT Amendment.amendment_number, Amendment.amendment_date, PolicyUpdates.update_type FROM Amendments Amendment INNER JOIN PolicyUpdates ON Amendment.policy_number = PolicyUpdates.policy_number;
SELECT * FROM PolicyUpdates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01' AND update_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyTerms
SELECT policy_number, term_start_date, term_end_date FROM PolicyTerms
SELECT id, policy_number, term_description FROM PolicyTerms WHERE term_start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_number, change_date, change_description FROM PolicyChanges ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT policy_number, update_date, update_description FROM PolicyUpdates
SELECT * FROM PolicyUpdates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, update_date, update_description FROM PolicyUpdates WHERE policy_number='ABC123';
SELECT * FROM PolicyTerms WHERE term_start_date > '2023-01-01' AND term_end_date < '2024-01-01';
SELECT policy_number, amendment_date, amendment_details FROM PolicyAmendments ORDER BY amendment_date ASC;
SELECT policy_number, change_date, change_description FROM PolicyChanges WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_updates WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder, update_date FROM policy_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT amendment_id, amendment_description FROM policy_amendments WHERE amendment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone FROM insurance_agents WHERE agent_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM policy_updates;
SELECT policy_holder, update_date FROM policy_updates WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT holder_name, holder_email FROM policy_holders WHERE holder_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM insurance_agents WHERE agent_id = 2;
SELECT amendment_id, amendment_date, amendment_description FROM policy_amendments ORDER BY amendment_date DESC;
